## Overview

**GNS3 Copilot** is an AI-powered network automation assistant designed specifically for GNS3 network simulator. It provides intelligent network device management and automated operations through natural language interaction.

![GNS3 Copilot Demo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yueguobin/gns3-copilot/refs/heads/master/demo.gif)

## Core Features

- ğŸ¤– **AI-driven conversational interface** - Natural language interaction
- ğŸ”§ **Device configuration management** - Batch configuration for multiple vendor devices
- ğŸ“Š **Topology management** - Create, modify, and manage GNS3 network topologies
- ğŸ¨ **Topology visualization** - SVG drawing support for automatic topology generation
- ğŸ” **Network diagnostics** - Intelligent troubleshooting and performance monitoring
- ğŸŒ **Multi-LLM support** - Integration with DeepSeek, OpenAI, Anthropic, XAI, and more
